bill_title: provide for the titling, registration, and operation of golf carts.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the titling, registration, and operation of golf carts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-3-1 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SUBDIVISION to read as follows: "Golf cart," a four-wheeled motor vehicle whose speed attainable in one mile is more than twelve miles per hour and not more than twenty miles per hour on a paved level surface; Section 2. That chapter 32-25 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No golf cart may be operated on any highway or roadway where the speed limit is more than thirty-five miles per hour. Nothing in this section prevents a local government from adopting more stringent local ordinances governing a golf cart operation on the highway or roadway. Section 3. That chapter 32-3 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: A golf cart which has or meets the following equipment and standards may be issued a title: (1) Headlamps; (2) Front and rear turn signal lamps; (3) Taillamps; (4) Stop lamps; (5) Reflex reflectors: one red on each side as far to the rear as practicable, and one red on the rear; (6) Rearview mirror; (7) A parking brake; and (8) A Vehicle Identification Number (VIN). The manufacturer certificate of origin or vehicle title shall clearly identify the vehicle as a golf cart. The department may not issue any vehicle identification number to any homemade golf cart. Section 4. That chapter 32-5 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any golf cart registered in accordance with § 32-5-5 shall be issued a license plate indicating that the vehicle is a golf cart. The license fee and compensation for use of the highways payable under § 32-5-5 is twenty dollars. Section 5. That chapter 32-35 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The owner of each golf cart shall maintain insurance as required by § 32-35-113. Section 6. That chapter 32-12 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any person operating a golf cart registered pursuant to section 4 of this Act shall hold a valid driver license.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
